001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.main;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.SimpleHolder;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Threads;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.SyntheticDataSets;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearRegression;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.BasisFunction;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.PolynomialFunction;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer.LinearBasisFunctionModelDecomposer;
014import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
015import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination;
016import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
017import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
018import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.TrainableFunction;
019import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.GradientDescentOptimizer;
020import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.UpdateStep;
021import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.steps.VanillaGradientDescent;
022import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.ChainedRegime;
023import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.EpochRegime;
024import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes;
025import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.ExplicitRegularization;
026import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.Plot;
027
028import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
029import java.util.Map;
030import java.util.Set;
031
032public class ModelIterativeLearning {
033
034    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
035    public static <N extends Number> void main(String[] args) {
036        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> numberTypeSupport = (JavaNumberTypeSupport<N>) JavaNumberTypeSupport.DOUBLE;
037        N learningRate = numberTypeSupport.valueOf(0.9f);
038        int epochs = 10_000_000;
039        int m = 9; // model complexity
040
041        VanillaGradientDescent<N> vanilla = new VanillaGradientDescent<>(learningRate);
042        showForNumberType(numberTypeSupport, "Vanilla", createOptimizer(vanilla), Set.of(), epochs, m);
043    }
044
045    private static <N extends Number> Optimizer<LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>, N> createOptimizer(UpdateStep<LinearCombination<N>, N> updateStep) {
046        LinearBasisFunctionModelDecomposer<N> decomposer = new LinearBasisFunctionModelDecomposer<>();
047        return new GradientDescentOptimizer<>(decomposer, updateStep);
048    }
049
050    private static <N extends Number> void showForNumberType(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, String title, Optimizer<LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>, N> optimizer, Set<ExplicitRegularization<N>> regularizations, int epochs, int m) {
051        Plot mrePlot = new Plot("RME " + title);
052        Plot fitPlot = new Plot("Fit " + title);
053        Plot weightPlot = new Plot("Absolute sum of weights " + title);
054        SimpleHolder<LinearRegression<N>> regressionHolder = SimpleHolder.create();
055
056        ChainedRegime regime = Regimes.epochs(epochs, EpochRegime.sample(250, new EpochRegime.EpochCompletionListener() {
057            @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
058            @Override
059            public <M extends Number> void epochCompleted(EpochRegime epochRegime, int currentEpoch, TrainableFunction<M> model, DataSet<M> trainingSet, Optimizer<? extends TrainableFunction<M>, M> optimizer) {
060                LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> linearBasisFunctionModel = (LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>) model;
061                Pair<Float, Map<String, Float>> currentRmes = regressionHolder.get().calculateRMEs(linearBasisFunctionModel);
062                mrePlot.addToSeries("Train RME", new float[]{currentEpoch}, new float[]{currentRmes.left()});
063                for (Map.Entry<String, Float> currentRmeEntry : currentRmes.right().entrySet()) {
064                    mrePlot.addToSeries(currentRmeEntry.getKey() + " RME", new float[]{currentEpoch}, new float[]{currentRmeEntry.getValue()});
065                }
066                mrePlot.redraw();
067                weightPlot.addToSeries("Total Weights", new float[]{currentEpoch}, new float[]{(float) (Array.stream(model.getParameters()).mapToDouble(p -> model.getNumberTypeSupport().absolute(p).doubleValue()).sum())});
068                weightPlot.redraw();
069                fitPlot.plotTargetOutput(linearBasisFunctionModel, "Fit");
070                fitPlot.redraw();
071                if (currentEpoch == epochs) {
072                    System.out.println(title + ": " + Array.toString(model.getParameters()));
073                }
074            }
075        })).batch();
076        LinearRegression<N> regression = createIterativeTrainedRegression(typeSupport, optimizer, regime);
077        regressionHolder.set(regression);
078
079        mrePlot.display();
080
081        fitPlot.setYRange(-2, 2);
082        fitPlot.plotDataSet(regression.getTrainSet(), "Train Set");
083        fitPlot.display();
084
085        weightPlot.display();
086
087        Threads.runAsynchronously(() -> regression.fitComplexity(m, regularizations));
088    }
089
090    private static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> createIterativeTrainedRegression(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, Optimizer<LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>, N> optimizer, Regime regime) {
091        SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator = SyntheticDataSets.sinus(typeSupport);
092        BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator = new PolynomialFunction.Generator<>(typeSupport);
093        return create(dataSetGenerator, basisFunctionGenerator, optimizer, regime);
094    }
095
096    public static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> create(SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator, BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator, Optimizer<LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>, N> optimizer, Regime regime) {
097        dataSetGenerator.setRandomSeed(165);
098        dataSetGenerator.setNoiseScale(0.5f);
099        DataSet<N> trainSet = dataSetGenerator.load(10);
100        DataSet<N> testSet = dataSetGenerator.load(10);
101        Map<String, DataSet<N>> testSets = new LinkedHashMap<>();
102        testSets.put("Test Set", testSet);
103        return new LinearRegression<>(basisFunctionGenerator, trainSet, testSets, optimizer, regime);
104    }
105
106}
